GSD.description:
ext4: add EXT4_INODE_HAS_XATTR_SPACE macro in xattr.h

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 4cdc284ffadd6a989f24107ee7f09be43b748fbb. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ext4: add EXT4_INODE_HAS_XATTR_SPACE macro in xattr.h
